## Part 1, the water data
```{r}
water <- read_csv("water.csv")
```

```{r}
pairs(water)
```

Of the variables, `Days` seems to have the least correlation with `Water`.

```{r}
cor(water)
```

The correlation coefficients confirm what I saw in the plots above.
